title: Chapter 1578 - Demanding An Explanation
body:
Chapter 1578 - Demanding An Explanation

Chai Beitong.

The miraculous genius in fifty-fifth place on the Universe Realm Immortal Rankings.

His combat prowess was sufficient to shake even early-stage Void Realm True Immortals. He was a true monster.

When he took action, all eyes were instantly upon him.

The corners of Xue Hongfeng’s lips twitched, and he sighed. “I might well take a beating, but I dare say with certainty that you’ll soon meet with disaster!”

Uproarious laughter followed his declaration.

Hua Xingchen couldn’t help but chuckle. This guy’s typically quite clever, but today, he’s so laughably juvenile. 

“You say we’re in for disaster? Well, no worries. You'll see disaster right now!”

Chai Beitong attacked directly. He disappeared into thin air, and a moment later, he was right in front of Xue Hongfeng. He swept his palm through the air with immense force, his hand swathed in glittering golden light.

An attack like that could have threatened even an ordinary Void Realm True Immortal!

There was no doubt about it. Chai Beitong wanted to defeat Xue Hongfeng in a single strike and ruthlessly humiliate him!

“Do you think I’m afraid of...
